simmasto0

Class C_GISManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • simmasto0.C_GISManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_sim_constants, I_ground_manager

    public class C_GISManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_ground_manager, I_sim_constants
    this class allows to read shapefile which contains polygons in order to use them as support for the simulation
    Author:
    Quentin - april 2009, jlefur review - may 2009, J-E. Longueville

        Parameters:

        geo_name - the geography of the context which will contains the "Field_Agents"

        the context where the ground is created

      • createCircle

        public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry createCircle(double x,
                                                double y,
                                                double RADIUS)
        This method allow to generate a geometry with a circle shape the type returned is "multipolygon" which is accept by repast simphony( and not a simple polygon)
        Parameters:
        x - : x coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - / y coordinate of the center of the circle
        RADIUS - :
        Returns:
